sentences.en: ...the cyclical nature of the airline business.
Cable network operator model determines the profit performance of its anti - cyclical.
sentences.cn: 有线电视网络运营商盈利模式决定了其业绩的 抗 周期性.

sentences.en: Emerging market growth does not make the sector less cyclical.
sentences.cn: 新兴市场的增长并不能降低该行业的周期性.

sentences.en: First, it is the world's economic operations cyclical adjustment results.
sentences.cn: 首先, 这是世界经济运行周期性调整的结果.

sentences.en: In part , the rise simply reflects the cyclical nature of most commodities.
sentences.cn: 价格提升在一定程度上反映了多数商品的周期性.

sentences.en: Interest rate generally fluctuates in a cyclical manner.
sentences.cn: 利率常以周期方式浮动。

sentences.en: JOANNE : So are you betting on secular versus cyclical changes?
sentences.cn: 所以,你在赌这一长期而又相对周期性的变革?

sentences.en: Manufacturing is highly cyclical, falling first and fast in a downturn.
sentences.cn: 制造业循环性强, 因此,在经济下行中最先下滑,速度也较快.

sentences.en: No, gossip is cyclical and karmic, like a boomerang.
sentences.cn: 不，流言是循环的，是有因果的，就像自食其果。

sentences.en: Procedures realize the cyclical nature of a single frequency tone.
sentences.cn: 程序中实现单一频率的周期性提示音.

sentences.en: Some do not even realise that cyclical downturns are normal.
sentences.cn: 有些人甚至不明白周期性衰退是正常的.

sentences.en: Survey shows that investment in defensive investment shift from cyclical stocks.
sentences.cn: 调查显示,投资人在从防守型投资转向周期性股票.

sentences.en: The complex of sand bodies developed in a cyclical sequence of off - lapping sedimentary beds.
sentences.cn: 砂岩复合体发育于退覆沉积层的旋回层内.

sentences.en: The first beneficiaries were stable, non - cyclical industries such as telecoms or healthcare.
sentences.cn: 首批受益者是电信和医疗等稳定的 非 周期性行业.

sentences.en: The object is no longer in cyclical motion.
sentences.cn: 这物体已不再循环运动.

sentences.en: The recycling industry is particularly vulnerable to wild cyclical swings in the market.
sentences.cn: 回收工业经受不了市场价格的同期性激烈涨落.

sentences.en: This type of cyclical movement is fairly common in Chinese instrumental music.
sentences.cn: 这种“循环体”结构在中国器乐曲中相当普遍.

words.tran_cn: 循环；周期；自行车；整套；一段时间

phrases.tran_cn: n. 循环变动，周期性波动

trans.tran_en: of or relating to a musical form consisting of several movements sharing thematic material
